title: Bill Belichick, Joe Burrow, Josh Rosen, Rams, & Cam Newton
itunes:title: Bill Belichick, Joe Burrow, Josh Rosen, Rams, & Cam Newton
description:
Colin talks about Bill Belichick probably knowing Tom Brady would leave, what the Dolphins might do to try and draft Joe Burrow, why Josh Rosen would be a good fit for the Patriots, why he doesn't like how the Rams are put together, and more on Cam Newton not getting much interests from other teams. Guests include Peter Schrager, Dr. Drew Pinsky, lance Zierlein, and Jason Whitlock.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
